welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alvin, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. Get ready to explore and experience all that Alvin has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ellington Field Airport serves both commercial and general aviation flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Ellington Field Airport is used for military operations and training.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

wifi.note: This WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brazoria County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brazoria County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Scholes Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Scholes Field Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
